issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Physical Optimizer
components.description: Optimizations which are dependent on runtime

fields.description: Bloom filter aggregation buffer may result in allocation of upto ~594MB array which is unnecessary.
fields.summary: Avoid memory allocation of aggregation buffer during stats computation
